alert.message: CMS CDC Source MENA Connector Task has failed
alert.name: Source Task Status alert

targets.query: SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "usage_user" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("application" = 'cdc-connect') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "application"
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "usage_user" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("application" = 'cdc-connect') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "application"

SELECT derivative(max("bytes_recv"), 1s) AS "bytes_recv", derivative(max("bytes_sent"), 1s) AS "bytes_sent" FROM "net" WHERE ("application" = 'cdc-connect') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s), "application"
SELECT mean("usage_user") AS "usage_user" FROM "cpu" WHERE ("application" = 'cdc-connect') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "application"
